api_list.api_description: Search for universities by name and filter by country with pagination capabilities.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name or part of the name of the university to search for.

optional_parameters.name: country
optional_parameters.description: The country to filter results by.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit on the number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of results to skip for pagination.

query: Can you find universities with 'Middle' in their name in Turkey?
